FILE(GLOB_RECURSE YAMLCPP_Headers "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/include/yaml-cpp/*.h")
FILE(GLOB_RECURSE YAMLCPP_Headers_EXTRA "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/*.h")
FILE(GLOB_RECURSE YAMLCPP_Sources "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/*.cpp")
SET( YAMLCPP_Headers ${YAMLCPP_Headers} ${YAMLCPP_Headers_EXTRA} CACHE STRING "YAML-CPP headers" FORCE )
SET( YAMLCPP_Sources ${YAMLCPP_Sources} CACHE STRING "YAML-CPP sources" FORCE )

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES( ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/contrib )

SET( CACHED_INCLUDE_DIRS
  ${CACHED_INCLUDE_DIRS}
  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/contrib )

ADD_LIBRARY( YAMLCPP ${YAMLCPP_Sources} )
